unnormalised: Tech'haan, P(A) = 0.6, P(B) = 0.4 ani P(A ∩ B) = 0.2, mhonn P(A | B) = 0.2/0.4 = 0.5; conditional probability samzunk ghevnchem stats-ant chavi!
normalised: Teṇeṃ, P dha A baraabara śūnyaa pointa saha, P dha B baraabara śūnyaa pointa chaara aani P dha A chedana B baraabara śūnyaa pointa doṇa, maga P dha A dilaa B baraabara śūnyaa pointa doṇa bhagile śūnyaa pointa chaara baraabara śūnyaa pointa paāncha; sartīya sambhāvyatechi jāṇivā sankhyāśāstrānta mahatvāchi!
